text: Johann Bernoulli (6 August 1667 - 1 January 1748) was a Swiss Calvinist mathematician. Several men in his family were mathematicians, including his brother Jacob Bernoulli. He is known for his work on infinitesimal calculus, and teaching Leonhard Euler when he was young. ==Other websites== *Biography Category:Swiss mathematicians Category:1667 births Category:1748 deaths Category:Scientists from Basel
title: Johann Bernoulli
